module.name: part_and_version_identification
module.name.french: Identification de version et de pièce
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the data that identify parts and their versions.

inscope.li: identification of a version of a part or of a non-countable material.

definition.def: a material the components of which cannot be counted or do not need to be counted Oil, Helium and sand are examples of non-countable material.
a discrete object that may come into existence as a consequence of a manufacturing process A part may contain components, which may be parts or non-countable materials.
a crude or partially processed material needed to initiate a manufacturing transformation process Crude oil and iron ore are examples of raw material.

uof.name: Part_And_Version_Identification
uof.description: The Part_And_Version_Identification UoF specifies the data structure for the representation of the identification of a part and a part version.

usage_guide.p: This clause describes usages of the concepts defined in this module.
This module can represent the identification information for a part.

example.p: A product, which is a detail part, is identified, by the organization 'NATO', with the code '28650001' and is known as 'Rear Panel'. The part has a version identified '--A'.
